title: game crashes on a custom game
body:
so just got dj sona skin wanted to have a look at it in a custom game and every time it does the loading in the game crashes anyone else getting this problem

edit: i just tryed a custom game with another champ and it keeps crashing every time does anyone else know what is going on with customs ?

replies.body:
ok so i got back from my studys today and i deleted the game client and uninstalled league im currently installing again but every time it stops at 86% with 269mb left

no i didnt play any games b4 i bought dj sona i bought it went for a custom game just to check it out then left to go to uni for the day

Please use the "Reply" feature of the boards to reply to someone's message, least they won't get notification.

Do any error dialogue messages or bugsplats appear when this happens?

Hey dragonX987,
I just tried a custom game with DJ Sona and other champions and everything worked as intended.
Is there anything else that could possibly be causing this? Could you try repairing your client for example?
Is there a set of runes/masteries/summoner spells that you used in both games?

-ToxicHawk

im re-installing the game now but i keeps stopping at 86% i was using my ap runes that i normaly use and my ad runes i use everything lastnight worked and had no problems just since i updated the patch 

my friend that lives with me can play it no problem
Could certain masteries/runes cause the game to crash? That's pure insanity if you ask me.
I tried repairing my client, didn't work, tried restarting etc.
Game finished, I got a leave, and now trying custom game but same problem
Did you have any games on patch 5.4 before purchasing the skin?

i have the same problem but its with any champ and ive tried custom, normals, and ranked, i now have 3 leaves on my name and cant connect, also i put a ticket into riot but no word back yet (not suprised)

EDIT: i am running a second repair right now, the first found no errors.

i have done a full re install, nothing has worked,
